attributes.action: read the SPPI (Scientific & Public Policy Institute) CO2 reports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government is keen to promote the IPCC propaganda but fails to balance this with the scientific facts reported regularly by the SPPI (available online - free). 
These show that whilst there is, and always has been, some climate change, it is not necessarily all bad and is happening far slower than we are led to believe. 
Gordon Brown is scaremongering, presumably as an excuse to raise taxes under the pretence of being "green". 
He will cover the countryside and shoreline with useless wind turbines (should be building anaerobic digesters - they reduce landfill AND produce energy!) and thus he will ruin the economy even further.
